title: Silver Risk Monitor (SLV)
subtitle: Outcome first: regime, drivers, and what changes next.
regime_description: Breakdown / stress regime with high shock and deeper drawdown risk.
top_drivers: Vol/shock score is 40/100 (20D realized vol percentile: 100th)
Risk appetite score is 80/100 (HY spread level: 2.88)

escalate: If extension stays high and shock flips to Triggered, BLUE can escalate to ORANGE.
If drawdown deepens and credit stress jumps, ORANGE can escalate to RED.
deescalate: If shock and credit flags turn off while extension cools, BLUE can normalize to GREEN.
If breakdown flags clear and trend stabilizes for multiple sessions, RED can step back to ORANGE.

rules.definition: Trend positive-to-neutral, shock low, credit stress quiet.
rules.escalation: Extension score rises above ~70th percentile while shock stays quiet.

rules.definition: Extended above trend, but no confirmed deterioration.
rules.escalation: Extension high + shock Watch/Triggered or credit starts widening.
rules.deescalation: Extension cools and deterioration flags remain off.

rules.definition: Extended + at least one deterioration pillar active.
rules.action_bias: Stop adding, trim rips, tighten risk
rules.escalation: Breakdown pattern appears (vol spike + drawdown / credit jump).
rules.deescalation: Shock clears and price stabilizes above key moving averages.

rules.definition: Breakdown / stress regime with high shock and deeper drawdown.
rules.deescalation: Shock flags turn off and trend repair persists for multiple sessions.
